title: The Class Exemplar
summary: Two students at the Mentalist Academy compete to be named the Class Exemplar, but their rivalry goes too far.

title: Trial by Future
summary: Amid the disasters of climate change in 2057, a tribunal puts the oldest man on trial for the profligacy of his generation.

title: In My Defense
summary: The defendant explains that your so-called evidence proves nothing.

title: Rhodo's Defense
summary: A giant sentient rhododendron defends itself from fumigation on the space station where it has lived for over nine hundred years.

title: The Mushroom and the Cold
summary: A disaffected mycologist searches for magic mushrooms to save his town.

title: The Bicyclist
summary: A mysterious bicycle at the trailhead leads a park ranger into trouble.
